name: Greptile
headline: AI expert on your codebase that you can query via an API
description:
Greptile is an AI that understands large codebases that you can query via an API. 

You can:
- Use it to chat with your codebase
- Plug it into Jira to generate descriptions for tickets, into GitHub to get automate PR reviews etc. with full knowledge of the codebase
- Build custom internal tools and automations on top of the API!

Greptile can be used via the cloud, or be hosted 100% on your cloud in an air-gapped VPC.

Today, 800+ software teams including Wombo, Metamask, Warp, Exa AI, Bland, Leya, and more use Greptile to accelerate their software development lifecycle.

founders.name: Daksh Gupta, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of Greptile - the AI expert that has full context of your codebase. 

I studied CS at Georgia Tech, and interned at Amazon, where I was so good that they named an Amazon locker after me.

founders.name: Vaishant Kameswaran, Founder
founders.description: Founder @ Greptile. CS from Georgia Tech, minor in Linguistics.

### WATCH THE DEMO
## Ship Faster.
Hundreds of teams use Greptile to accelerate their software development lifecycle.
## The AI Code Review Bot
Automatically review PRs in GitHub and GitLab with full context of your codebase. [See a sample PR review →](https://www.greptile.com/<https:/github.com/twentyhq/twenty/pull/8656>)
## Automated Code Review with Full Codebase Understanding 
### PR Summaries
Natural-language summary of changes
### Get a summary of every PR in natural language to understand the context of the changes.
### In-line comments
Context-aware comments on your PRs
### In-line comments to identify bugs, antipatterns, and merge up to 80% faster.
### In-line suggestions
Quick fix suggestions
### Click-to-accept suggestions to fix minor issues in your PR.
### Chat with Greptile
Ask follow-up questions
### Chat with Greptile to ask follow-up questions, ask for suggestions, and get more context about the changes.
## Customizeable API for custom AI developer tools 
### The Greptile API
Embed a codebase expert into any part of your SDLC. Integrate with Sentry to diagnose alerts, Notion to write documentation, and much more.
[Read the docs ](https://www.greptile.com/</docs/introduction>)
## GitHub Pull Request Review and Analysis 
### Full codebase context
## Complete context of your entire codebase
Unlike most tools, Greptile generates a detailed graph of your codebase and understands how everything fits together.
30+ languages supported
Index updated on every commit
Works with microservices or monoliths
## Enterprise Code Review Security and Compliance 
### Enterprise Security
Security-First Design
Used by companies in healthcare, finance, and defense, Greptile is built to meet the highest security standards.
SOC 2 Compliant
    
Industry-standard security practices with regular third-party audits.
[Learn more →](https://www.greptile.com/</security>)
Self-Hosted Deployment
    
Deploy in your own air-gapped environment with complete control over your infrastructure.
[Learn more →](https://www.greptile.com/</security>)
No Model Training
    
We will never use your code for training or fine-tuning.
[Learn more →](https://www.greptile.com/</security>)
## AI Code Quality Checker and Code Review Bot 
FAQs
## Frequently Asked Questions
### How does Greptile pricing work?
Greptile chat is a fixed monthly subscription. API pricing is per request. Code review pricing is usage-based up to $50/developer, then free past that. See our pricing page for more
### Can Greptile be self-hosted?
Yes, you can self-host the entirety of Greptile in your own AWS environment, and even use your own LLM providers for added flexibility.
### Are there free trials or discounts available for Greptile?
Greptile offers free usage for qualified open source projects and significant discounts for pre-Series A startups. Contact hello@greptile.com to check your eligibility.
### What programming languages does Greptile support?
Greptile fully supports Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, Elixir, Java, C, C++, C#, Swift, PHP, and Rust. Most other languages are supported with slightly lower response quality.
### Is Greptile compatible with GitLab and BitBucket?
Yes, Greptile integrates seamlessly with GitLab and BitBucket in addition to GitHub.
### Can I use Greptile's API for my own product?
Yes, we offer discounted bulk pricing for API use. Please contact us at support@greptile.com for more information.
## Ship faster today.
Schedule time with our team or self-serve onboard in <2 minutes.

14-days free, no credit card required

generated_description:
**Greptile: Your AI Codebase Expert**

Founded in 2023 and a part of Y Combinator's W24 batch, Greptile is based in the heart of San Francisco, bringing an innovative approach to software development teams. Their mission? To provide an AI expert that understands your entire codebase, accessible effortlessly via an API. 

**What Can You Do with Greptile?**

1. **Chat with Your Codebase**: Picture querying your codebase just like chatting with a colleague. Need insights or clarifications? Greptile has you covered.
   
2. **Integrate with Popular Tools**: Seamlessly plug Greptile into **Jira** for crafting ticket descriptions or **GitHub** for automated pull request (PR) reviews. It understands the intricacies of your codebase, making automation smarter.
   
3. **Custom Tool Development**: With Greptile's API, you can build tailored internal tools and automations that suit your team's specific needs.

4. **Deployment Flexibility**: Whether you prefer cloud options or need something more secure, Greptile can be hosted in 100% air-gapped environments.

**Who’s Using Greptile?**

Today, over 800 software teams—including notable names like Wombo, Metamask, and Exa AI—are leveraging Greptile to enhance their software development lifecycles. The feedback is unanimously positive, with users highlighting its effectiveness in catching bugs and providing valuable insights in code reviews.

**Why Greptile Stands Out**

- **Depth of Understanding**: Unlike many tools, Greptile generates a detailed graph of your entire codebase, providing context that ensures its suggestions are relevant and actionable across over 30 programming languages.
  
- **Security**: Its design is security-first and SOC 2 compliant, making it a trusted choice for teams in sensitive sectors like healthcare and finance.
  
- **Affordable Pricing**: Greptile offers a straightforward pricing structure—fixed monthly subscriptions for chat, while API requests and code reviews operate on a usage basis, making it scalable for growing teams.

**Join the Movement!**

Greptile is more than just a tool; it’s a partner in your development journey. For teams wanting to ship faster without losing quality, Greptile's combination of automation, smart suggestions, and ease-of-use is hard to beat.

Curious to see it in action? [Try Greptile for free](https://www.greptile.com) today—there’s no credit card required for the trial. As the software landscape evolves, having a savvy companion like Greptile might just be what you need to stay ahead.
